content: Just attended a local AI in Finance meetup. Learned about new machine learning techniques for predictive analytics. Might integrate these into my strategies. Also, my trading friend introduced me to a local blockchain startup.
Met with the blockchain startup. They're looking for someone with my background in trading and AI. Exciting, but I'm taking it slow. Meanwhile, started coding a basic predictive model for my fund.

Coding the predictive model has been a challenge. Ran into issues with data preprocessing. Asked for help on a trading forum. Also, had a virtual coffee chat with a mentor; his advice on market making was spot-on.
Got feedback on my model from the forum. Realized my approach was too narrow. Expanded the data set and refined the algorithm. Also, the blockchain startup wants me to present a strategy next week.
Presented my trading strategy to the startup. They loved the integration of AI and blockchain. Might have an offer soon. Also, my model now shows promising results. Time to test it with real funds.
Received an offer from the blockchain startup! It's a junior position, but it's a foot in the door. Meanwhile, my trading fund is operational. Made my first trade today. Small, but significant.

First week at the new job has been intense. Learning the ins and outs of their trading platform. Also, my fund took a small hit. Time to revisit my risk management framework. Need to balance work and trading.

Had a breakthrough at work. Optimized the trading algorithms, which led to better trade execution. Also, refined my risk management strategy. No more overleveraging. Life feels like it's back on track.
Work's going well. But trading my own fund? It's a different beast. Had a minor setback, but I'm learning. Reached out to a mentor for guidance on managing personal funds alongside a job.
Been analyzing my trades. Found a pattern in my losses. Need to diversify my strategies. Also, got positive feedback at work. My mentor's advice has been invaluable in both spheres of my life.

Implemented a new trading strategy at work, which led to a significant gain. Also, my personal fund is showing signs of recovery. Been connecting with peers in the trading community, strengthening my support system.

Just celebrated a small milestone. My trading fund has reached a new high. Work's been rewarding too. Reflecting on the journey so far. It's not just about the money, but about the growth, the lessons, and the connections.
